# A repository for results of the Sfn data paper

Figures and tables

## Requirements

To run the code in this repository, one needscthe following structure within the project folder:

+ data: contains the sapfluxnet data version(s), e.g. 0.1.3.
+ maps: contains the necessary base maps
  + maps/Crowther_Nature_Files_Revision_01_WGS84_GeoTiff: contains global tree density map from Crowther
  in Nature
